title: Shoutout to all Riot Employees
body:
I just got access to the Alpha client. I must say, I am very impressed. It's amazing
The detail is stunning, you haven't rushed it. It seems weird to use, but that is simply because I'm use to the original client.
But Riot Games. You have made an amazing Client.

All give yourselves a pat on the back! All of you deserve it. Keep it up Riot Games!

Kind regards,
Soulless Reaper

replies.body: i personally think the interface is too much like dont get me wrong looks awesome but less is more imo its interesting but i prefer the current client now

Yea. It's very daunting. I do like the current Client setup it's user friendly. But I think you will find we're just very use to the old client as we've probably used the same client for 2-3 years, if you've played for that long.
Otherthan that I think we will begin to like it, I love the ranked queues and how the map comes up. It's really beautiful

Nope, technically speaking the new client is optimised better than the legacy client, and has a much better underlying framework. That said, for now it still has to interface with the legacy client, so functions like picking a champion are quite slow.

had to end up uninstalling the Alpha for the time being, until I find these issues fixed.

Really upset from this tbh....
